snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg plans to visit Chicago and Boston, the respective homes of the Obama and Romney campaigns, to press for an overhaul of immigration policies.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg plans to visit the respective homes of the Obama and Romney presidential campaigns, Chicago and Boston, to hold public discussions and press for an overhaul of immigration policies
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg plans to visit Chicago and Boston, the respective homes of the Obama and Romney campaigns, to press for an overhaul of immigration policies.

headline.seo: Bloomberg to Press Obama and Romney Campaigns on Immigration
headline.main: In ’12 Race, Mayor Seeks Immigration Discussion
headline.print_headline: In ’12 Race, Mayor Seeks Immigration Discussion
